title: Chengdu City Centre Hotel on Chunxi Road Shopping Street
description: In the heart of this cosmopolitan city, Crowne Plaza Chengdu City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to fine food and fashion. Awaken in a calming guestroom before energising yourself in the fitness centre or indoor pool. Enjoy a tranquil game of mahjong in the Tea House or relish views of Chengdu from the 25th floor while savouring sumptuous steaks and seafood at the Grill Room. Venture out for retail therapy and authentic street food on the vibrant Chunxi Road Shopping Street.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chengdu City Centre, an IHG hotel

title: Vibrant Chengdu High-Tech District Stay with Three Bars & Restaurants
description:
Feel instantly at home in the heart of Chengdu at this stylish abode, offering a blend of Eastern hospitality and Western comfort. Hyatt House Chengdu Peddle Walk offers spacious rooms and suites that are perfect for city breaks and extended adventures, with views of Chengdu's evolving skyline.

Fuel your Sichuan exploration at Gallery Kitchen with a full breakfast spread before heading out. Located in the buzzing Shiyangchang District, you're steps from Pebble Walk's high-end shopping paradise and a short drive from Chengdu's centre. With Tianfu Square and Wuhou Temple awaiting exploration, you're all set to experience the city's contemporary energy and timeless charm.
offer_address: No.669, Wanxiang South Road, High-Tech District, Chengdu 610094, China

title: Stylish Chengdu Mansion-Style Escape with Indoor Pool, Three Restaurants & Tea House
description:
Step into a Chinese mansion-style escape high above the city in Chengdu’s dynamic Jinjiang District, where timeless elegance meets modern sophistication. Inspired by jade craftsmanship and the Sichuan Opera, this refined retreat crowns the Western International Financial Centre from the 38th floor up, offering sweeping views of the Jinjiang River and the skyline beyond.

Dine on bold Sichuan and Cantonese flavours at the hotel's gourmet restaurants and indulge in mahjong, chess and card games while enjoying authentic tea tastings at the Tea House. Relax in the mirrored-ceiling pool or unwind at the spa with rejuvenating treatments. Plus, with Taikoo Li, Chunxi Road, and the beloved panda sanctuaries nearby, this elevated haven is your luxurious gateway to Chengdu’s best.
offer_address: Tower 2, WIFC, 258 East Street, Chengdu, Sichuan 610011, China

vendor_name: TIVOLI CHENGDU AT CULTURAL HERITAGE PARK
title: Five-Star Chengdu Tivoli Escape with Anantara Spa & Four Restaurants
description: Set in the heart of the International Intangible Cultural Heritage Park, the five-star Tivoli Chengdu at Cultural Heritage Park is a lush urban escape framed by semi-tropical gardens. Luxuriate in refined guestrooms, keep active in the fitness centre and indoor pool or rejuvenate at the Anantara Spa with wellness rituals and salt steam rooms before feasting on diverse gourmet options including refined Portuguese cuisine at Casa de Fados and Sichuan delicacies at Tihong Chinese Restaurant.
location_description: Tivoli Chengdu at Cultural Heritage Park
offer_address: No. 601-1 Guanghua Avenue, International Intangible Cultural Heritage Expo Park, Qingyang District, Chengdu

title: Ultra-Modern China Chengdu City Break in Bio-Town with Indoor Pool
description:
Experience the charm of China's Sichuan province with a stay at this peaceful base set at the edge of Chengdu's forward-thinking Bio-Town. Surrounded by greenery, lakeside trails and forest paths, days here involve quiet strolls and urban exploration at sights like Yong'an Lake Forest Park, Tianfu Square and the charming Jinli Street.

Whether travelling for work or leisure, kick-start your mornings with an energising breakfast from The Kitchen, and watch The Bar transition from tea and coffee by day to crafted cocktails by night. Keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre, then cool off at the indoor pool.
offer_address: No.1 Huigu Road, Shuangliu District, Chengdu, Sichuan 610200, China

title: Five-Star Sancha Lake Escape within China's Alpine Region
description: Immerse yourself in China's surreal alpine region's rich history and electric atmosphere with a five-star escape to InterContinental Sancha Lake. Located just steps from the glittering lake the elegant and modern hotel is the perfect base to discover the charms of the region. When you're not exploring the local sights, stay in and be spoilt for choice with an ultra-modern fitness centre, a lavish heated indoor swimming pool and five speciality dining venues.
location_description: InterContinental Sancha Lake, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Huanhu West Road, Xinmin Village, Eastern New Area, Chengdu, Sichuan, 641418, China

title: Glamorous Chengdu Escape with Five Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience the genuine warmth of authentic Sichuan hospitality at the InterContinental Century City Chengdu, an IHG Hotel. When you're not out and about enjoying the teahouse culture or encountering the local wildlife (don't miss a visit to the Giant Panda Breeding Research Base), spend quiet moments unwinding in your room, or savouring gourmet delights at any of the onsite restaurants and bars in the Century City complex on the ground floor.
location_description: InterContinental Century City Chengdu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 88 Century City Boulevard, Chengdu, Sichuan, 610041, Mainland China

title: Five-Star Chengdu Residences in the Culinary Heart of China
description: Make yourself at home at InterContinental Residences Chengdu City Center, an IHG Hotel, a dazzling sky-high residence with city views in the heart of the Sichuan capital. Boasting spacious and stylish residences, this hotel offers a contemporary home away from home. Enjoy themed activities that explore the culture of Chengdu, feast on a fusion of Western and Asian flavours at the restaurant or explore the popular local markets for an authentic culinary adventure of your own.
location_description: InterContinental Residences Chengdu City Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.111, Zhihui Street, Jinjiang District, Chengdu, Sichuan Province, 610016, China

title: Contemporary Chengdu Stay at World's Largest Building with Ocean Park
description: Experience a world at your fingertips at the InterContinental Chengdu Global Center, a hotel experience that offers an aquatic adventure like no other. Escape to a massive artificial beach at Paradise Island Water Park opposite the hotel, visit cinemas or a skating rink for a spot of entertainment, or shop until you drop in one of the largest retail spaces ever built. When all the fun is done, enjoy a good night's sleep in a gorgeous guest room.
location_description: Intercontinental Chengdu Global Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1736 Tianfu Avenue North, Chengdu, Sichuan, 610041, Mainland China

title: Chengdu Refined Retreat near Giant Panda Base
description: Conveniently located a short distance from iconic sightseeing opportunities, Crowne Plaza Chengdu Panda Garden is a refined gateway to the Sichuan capital. Revitalise body and mind at the fitness centre or with a rejuvenating treatment at the Sense Spa. Savour authentic Sichuan cuisine at one of the three onsite restaurants or embark on an animal adventure with a complimentary shuttle service to the Chengdu Panda Base or Chengdu Zoo Metro Station for a close encounter of the furry kind.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chengdu Panda Garden, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Poly Park 198, No. 1980 ShuLong Avenue, Xindu District, Chengdu, Sichuan 610503, China

title: Stylish Chengdu City Escape near CBD with Onsite Dining
description:
Discover the dynamic spirit of Chengdu in Sichuan Province with a stay at this stylish retreat located just south of Chengdu CBD, tucked away in the technology district. Start your day with a hearty breakfast at the Gallery Restaurant, grab a quick bite from H Market or unwind with drinks and light nibbles at H Bar - perfect for on-the-go lifestyles.

When you're ready to explore, you’ll be positioned near Chengdu’s top attractions, from the world-famous panda sanctuary to the colossal New Century Global Center, offering endless dining, shopping and entertainment options.
offer_address: No. 669 Wanxiang South Road, High-Tech District, Chengdu 610041, China

title: Chengdu West Urban Retreat in High-Tech Zone
description: On the doorstep of Chengdu's West High-Tech Zone, Crowne Plaza Chengdu West, an IHG Hotel, is a refined urban retreat ideally located to experience this magnificent city. Awaken refreshed in elegant and artistic guest rooms, before energising your body at the onsite fitness centre. Sample sumptuous Cantonese cuisine at Yu Di Fu Chinese restaurant or a global array of diverse dishes at the Garden Cafe before embarking on a sightseeing expedition in cosmopolitan Chengdu.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chengdu West, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Xixin Avenue, High-Technology West Zone, Chengdu 610041, Sichuan, China

title: Five-Star Kempinski Escape in the Heart of Chengdu with Six Restaurants & Bars
description: Amongst Sichuan’s terraced teahouses, dramatic mountains, swaying bamboo forests and mouth-numbingly delicious cuisine stands the Kempinski Hotel Chengdu, offering contemporary luxury in the heart of China’s region of abundance. With a world-class spa and six excellent restaurants and bars, it’s the perfect base for your exploration of the area's countless cultural and historical treasures, including the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Mount Qingcheng and the Dujiangyan Irrigation System, and the city’s famous Giant Panda Breeding Research Base.
offer_address: Ren Min Nan Road 42, 610041 Chengdu, China
